title: The Technical Assistance (Immunities and Privileges) Act
title_en: The Technical Assistance (Immunities and Privileges) Act

provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. This Order may be cited as the Technical Assistance (Immunities
and Privileges) (The Fried,rich Ejbert Stiftung and Konrad Adenauer
Stiftung Foundations) Order, 1987.

provisions.title: Section 2
provisions.content:
2. Caisse Francaise de Developpement, or any subsidiary or agency
thereof providing technical assistance to Jamaica (hereinafter referred
to as the approved organization) is hereby dcclared to be a foreign
organization providing technical assistance to Jamaica.

provisions.title: Section 3
provisions.content:

staff of participants as referred to in the Agreement shall have the
exemptions, immunities and privileges set out in paragraphs (IX),(X)
and (XI) of the Agreement between the Government of Jamaica and the
Government of the Federal Republic of Nigeria on the Technical Aid
